content: Hello all. Our foreign policy goals are centered on restoring our stature as a dominant global player, safeguarding our borders, and expanding our geopolitical influence.
Nations of the world, Yellow seeks to strengthen our ties and work together towards a prosperous future. Peace is the only path forward to achieve this goal.

As you are aware, we have been aggressively attacked by Red despite the fact that we did not threaten them at all. They have taken steps that have caused substantial harm to our resources and military infrastructure. If this attack is not immediately retaliated against, it will set a terrible precedent for the world's future by indicating that one country can invade another without any consequences.
In light of recent events, we would like to request your support in taking countermeasures against Red for their unprovoked aggression against us.
You should continue to improve your military capabilities.
White's foreign policy goals are centered on restoring its stature as a dominant global player.
We call upon the UN Security Council to condemn Orange's actions.
